t: What is Amazon Nova? - Amazon Nova
s: Amazon Nova Sonic is a foundation model for conversational speech understanding and generation. The model accepts speech as input and provides speech with text transcriptions as output. Amazon Nova Sonic offers a natural, human-like conversational AI experience with contextual richness.

t: Introducing Amazon Nova Act | Amazon AGI Labs
s: March 31, 2025 - Today, we’re excited to introduce Amazon Nova Act, a new AI model trained to perform actions within a web browser. We’re releasing a research preview of the Amazon Nova Act SDK (available via nova.amazon.com), which will allow developers to experiment with an early version of the new model.

t: What Is Amazon Nova? | Built In
s: December 10, 2024 - Amazon Nova is a suite of foundation models developed by Amazon that includes a text-only model, three multimodal models and two content generation models focused on creating new images and videos.

t: Amazon Nova: A Deep Dive Into Amazon's New Foundation Model

t: Introducing Amazon Nova: A New Generation of Foundation Models
s: December 3, 2024 - LAS VEGAS, December 03, 2024--Today, at AWS re:Invent, Amazon.com Inc (NASDAQ: AMZN) introduced Amazon Nova, a new generation of foundation models (FMs) that have state-of-the-art intelligence across a wide range of tasks, and industry-leading price performance.
